column2: DEPOT IN LA PASSAGNE IS SECURE. OVER.
ENEMY BASE IS OF CHAPOI IS WIPED OUT. GOOD JOB. OVER.
BE ADVICED LE PORT AREA, SEA PORT IS NOW CLEARED OF ANY ENEMY FORCES. OVER.
LA RIVIERE SEA PORT HAVE BEEN CLEARED. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. ALL RUSSIANS ARE WIPED OUT FROM THIS ISLAND. EXCELLENT WORK. OVER.
